
This repository contains additional files for the manuscript 'cola: an R/Bioconductor Package for Consensus Partitioning through a General Framework'.

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
rmd_files = scan(pipe("ls */*.Rmd"), what = "character")
ind = gsub("suppl_(\\d+)_.*$", "\\1", basename(rmd_files))
ind = as.numeric(ind)

title = sapply(rmd_files, function(f) {
	ln = readLines(f)
	ln = ln[grepl("^title:", ln)]
	ln = gsub("^title:\\s+\"(.*)\"$", "\\1", ln)
	ln
})

od = order(ind)
ind = ind[od]
title = title[od]
rmd_files = rmd_files[od]

library(GetoptLong)

qqcat("- Additional File @{ind}: [@{title}](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_supplementary/@{gsub('Rmd$', 'html', rmd_files)})\n")
```
